name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of frothed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and topped with whipped cream.

name: Americano
description: A combination of freshly pulled shots of espresso with hot water that achieves the size of a standard cup of brewed coffee

name: Macchiato
description: An coffee drink made with espresso, topped with a small amount of foamed or steamed milk to allow the taste of the espresso to still shine through

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink that is made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foamed milk.
